name: Beacon WordPress Plugin
author: Jonatan Heyman

sections.description:
Provides real-time notifications of comments through the real-time cloud service Beacon (http://beaconpush.com/).
Visitors will get real-time notifications when comments are posted to blog posts that they are reading.

Author

Created by Jonatan Heyman (http://heyman.info)
sections.installation:
1. Unzip beacon-wordpress.zip into /wp-content/plugins/
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress admin
  3. Go to the ‘Beacon Settings’ page in the WordPress admin, and enter your Beacon API key and your Beacon Secret Key.
  4. Done!

short_description: Provides real-time notifications of comments through the real-time cloud service Beacon (http://beaconpush.com/).
